meanings.definition: (of money or benefits) to be received or accumulated over time
meanings.sent1: The accrued interest on the savings account was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent2: The accrued benefits from the job made the employees happy.
meanings.sent3: The accrued rewards for good behavior made the students excited.
meanings.sent4: The accrued happiness from spending time with loved ones is priceless.
meanings.sent5: The accrued knowledge from reading books is invaluable.

meanings.definition: to increase in quantity or value over time
meanings.sent1: Her savings started to accrue interest after a year.
meanings.sent2: The snowball effect caused the debt to accrue rapidly.
meanings.sent3: The number of followers on social media began to accrue slowly.
meanings.sent4: His reputation began to accrue like a snowball rolling down a hill.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of exercise accrue over time, leading to a healthier lifestyle.
